channel.title: 317 Changing Specs
channel.description: I'm new to this whole server thing, the client and source I'm using is PlanetPK or Pk Planet. I don't like the ags spec and the D Claw spec doesn't show, Idk if the gfx for that is there or not. Also I'd like to add skill cape emotes. Codes, links to tutorials, anything would be of help. Thank you :)

item.title: 317 Changing Specs
item.dc:creator: @ltxwolf ltxwolf
item.description:
@ltxwolf wrote:

I use same source and client heres ags spec (old):
if(j == 601){ // Armadyl2test
aClass23Array403[j].anInt405 = 2849;
aClass23Array403[j].anInt406 = 7075;
aClass23Array403[j].aClass20_407 = Class20.aClass20Array351[aClass23Array403[j].anInt406];
}
add it in ur class26.java if u dont got it and got to source open up client.java
search for
if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 35 && specialAmount > 49){
specialAtkNPC(false, 50, -1, 305);
npcDamage(30);
specGFX(729);
}
replace the 729 whit 601 done!!!

Read full topic

item.title: 317 Changing Specs
item.dc:creator: @abatssk8ter abatssk8ter
item.description:
@abatssk8ter wrote:

All you need to do is modify the clicking of the skill cape emote and find the anims and gfx’s of the skillcapes in your base

Read full topic
